text: Mircea Albulescu (; real name Iorgu Constantin Albulescu; 4 October 1934 – 8 April 2016) was a Romanian actor, university professor (Doctor of Arts), journalist, poet, and writer. He was a member of the Writers' Union of Romania (Uniunea Scriitorilor). He was known for his roles in Michael the Brave, Capcana mercenarilor, and Semne în pustiu. He was born in Bucharest. He graduated from the Secondary School of Architecture in 1952, and in 1956 he graduated from the Institute of Theatrical and Cinematographic Art in Bucharest. Albulescu died on 8 April 2016 in Bucharest, Romania from heart failure, aged 81.A murit Mircea Albulescu ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Romanian movie actors Category:Romanian writers Category:Romanian academics Category:Actors from Bucharest
title: Mircea Albulescu
